remarks: The value of the partial isomorphism A at the fiducial co-atom is the set of all translations i.e. the entire vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dia1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dia1.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dia1.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dia1N $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> ( I ` W ) = T ) $.
